summary: With this mod you can wear a Dragon Priest Mask and don\'t lose the effect of \"Mage Armor\" perk.
descriptionHtml:
Are you a mage and do you like the Dragon Priest Masks? But you can\'t use them because them are incompatibles with the \"Mage Armor\" perk? You are lucky, I come to help you.

With this mod you can wear a Dragon Priest Mask and don\'t lose the effect of \"Mage Armor\" perk. The masks will continue being an armor (light or heavy) and they will proporcionate their corresponding armor.

Enjoy this mod.
author: antares
